title: EASE CARE TEXTURED SHIRT
description1: Shirt made of fabric with easy care and everyday maintenance texture.
description2: Slim fit spread collar shirt featuring long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Button-up front.

title: COMFORT OVERSHIRT WITH POCKETS
description: Collared overshirt made of a stretchy fabric. Long sleeves with snap-button cuffs. Chest patch pockets. Front snap-button fastening.

title: EMBROIDERED SHIRT
description: Relaxed-fit shirt made of cotton. Camp collar and short sleeves. Contrast embroidery on the front. Button-up front.

title: HIROSHI NAGAI PRINT SHIRT
description: Relaxed fit shirt made of a satiny fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. © Hiroshi Nagai graphic prints all over the garment. Side vents at the hem. Button-up front.

title: CHECK FLANNEL SHIRT
description: Regular fit collared shirt made of cotton with a flannel finish. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest patch pocket. Split hem. Button-up front.

title: DENIM SHIRT
description: Regular fit collared shirt made of denim fabric. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest patch pockets with flaps. Faded effect. Front snap-button fastening.

title: CREASED-EFFECT JACQUARD OVERSHIRT
description: Relaxed fit spread collar overshirt made of a creased-effect fabric. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Button-up front.

title: RIPSTOP PUFFER JACKET
description1: Puffer jacket made of technical ripstop textured fabric that is resistant to tearing.
description2: High neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Zip pockets at the hip and an inside pocket detail. Adjustable hem with elasticated sides. Zip-up front.

title: TEXTURED CROCHET SHIRT
description: Relaxed fit shirt made of open textured fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. Button-up front.

title: SATIN MIDI SKIRT
description: High-waist skirt with an elastic waistband.

title: CAMISOLE DRESS WITH RHINESTONE STRAPS
description: Satin dress featuring a cowl neckline, thin straps with rhinestone bead appliqués and gathered detail at the sides of the waist

title: SATIN SHIRT
description: Collared shirt with a V-neckline. Long cuffed sleeves. Front button fastening.

title: LEATHER EFFECT COAT
description: Coat with a lapel collar and long sleeves with shoulder pads. Front welt pockets. Back vent at the hem. Double-breasted front button fastening.

title: SATIN SHIRT WITH BOW
description: Collared shirt featuring a contrast tie and long sleeves. Button-up front fastening.

title: SOFT OVERSIZE COAT
description: Coat with a lapel collar and long sleeves. Front pockets. Double-breasted button fastening on the front.

title: LOS ANGELES LAKERS NBA ©
description: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Featuring an embroidered LOS ANGELES LAKERS NBA © motif on the chest, a print on the back and a label appliqué on the hem.

title: BASIC POLO SHIRT
description: Collared polo shirt with short sleeves and a buttoned yoke.

title: HEAVY WASH SLOGAN SWEATSHIRT
description: Sweatshirt with a round neck and long sleeves with ribbed trims. Featuring a front slogan print.

title: SOFT-TOUCH T-SHIRT
description: Round neck T-shirt with long sleeves. Button fastening on the shoulder. Special soft fabric.

title: HEAVY WASH SLOGAN SWEATSHIRT
description: Sweatshirt with a round neck and long sleeves with ribbed trims. Featuring a front slogan print.
